# Memoized.io - Master Technical Interviews the JavaScript Way

Memoized.io is an educational platform dedicated to helping JavaScript and TypeScript engineers master technical interviews and improve their programming skills.

## About
A comprehensive learning platform offering:
- Structured learning paths for modern JavaScript engineers
- In-depth courses covering data structures, algorithms, and advanced JavaScript concepts
- Hands-on practice with real-world examples
- Interview-ready techniques and strategies
- Premium resources and personalized learning tracks

## Course Tracks
### JavaScript Track
- Core Fundamentals: Engine, runtime, closures, prototypes, asynchronous JavaScript
- TypeScript Introduction: Types, interfaces, generics, advanced concepts
- Frontend Development: Component architecture, state management, performance
- Advanced Concepts: Functional programming, meta-programming, design patterns

### Data Structures & Algorithms Track
- Built-in Data Structures: Strings, arrays, objects, sets, maps
- User-defined Data Structures: Linked lists, trees, graphs, heaps
- Common Techniques: Sliding window, two pointers, binary search, dynamic programming
- Advanced Topics: Bloom filters, segment trees, network flow algorithms

## Features
- Interactive code examples and practice problems
- Progress tracking and learning analytics
- Premium subscription with advanced content
- Mobile-responsive learning experience
- Dark/light theme support

## Contact
- Website: https://www.memoized.io
- GitHub: https://github.com/msiric
- Platform: Next.js-based educational platform

## Content Types
- Interactive lessons with code examples
- Practice problems and solutions
- Technical interview preparation materials
- Algorithm implementations and explanations
- Real-world application examples

Last updated: November 2025
